references.paper_title: 3D Gaussian splatting for real-time radiance field rendering
references.reason: This paper introduces 3D Gaussian splatting, a foundational technique that the current paper builds upon and improves.

references.paper_title: SC-GS: Sparse-controlled 3D Gaussian splatting for editable dynamic scene reconstruction
references.reason: This paper is a state-of-the-art method for dynamic scene reconstruction using 3D Gaussian splatting, providing a direct comparison for the proposed method.

references.paper_title: 3DGStream: On-the-fly training of 3D Gaussians for efficient streaming of photo-realistic free-viewpoint videos
references.reason: This paper tackles dynamic scene reconstruction with memory efficiency, addressing a key challenge also tackled by the current work.

references.paper_title: Spacetime Gaussian feature splatting for real-time dynamic view synthesis
references.reason: This paper proposes a method for dynamic view synthesis using spacetime Gaussians, representing another significant approach to the problem.

references.paper_title: Swings: Sliding windows for dynamic 3D gaussian splatting
references.reason: This paper addresses the limitations of existing methods in handling long sequences and complex motion, providing another important contextual approach.
